user_input: Transfer the SMR category in the Generator class to the Gas Plant Class
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Transfer the 'SMR' category from the 'Generator' class to the 'Gas Plant' class within the current PLEXOS model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Transfer the SMR category in the Generator class to the Gas Plant Class', select the category named 'SMR' currently under class 'Generator' and move it to class 'Gas Plant'. If multiple 'SMR' categories exist, choose the one in the 'Generator' class.
